entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Bugs in Absolute Layout with .NET 9 #26317
  • WKWebView Handler crash do_icall interp.c, line 2286 SIGTRAP #26314
  • The .NET 9 Maui app unable to read .json file #26310
  • Build tasks are not localized #26308
    .NET 9 SR3
  • [testing] Appium failing to install #26305
    .NET 9 SR2
  • Shell.Current.FlyoutBehavior is not taking account in a mixed Flyout Behavior scenario #26302
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • iOS/Catalyst build performance regression from net8.0 to net9.0 #26300

Closed

  • BindingFailure issue although DataType is set correctly #26288
  • .Net9 MAUI template does not work on Samsung Galaxy device #26293
  • .net 9 maui Shell.Current.GotoAsync("..") app crash with debugger is attached exception on windows when back from a page that implements map control #26289
  • Intermittent System.IO Errors During Build, Rebuild, and Clean Operations #26316
  • [9.0.100] NETSDK1083: RuntimeIdentifier 'win10-x86' is not recognized in .NET 9.0 for .NET 8 Target Framework with Evergine 2024.6.28.781 #26052
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Unable to launch app after it's uploaded #26294
  • Significant drop in supported Android devices after updating app to .NET 9 #26301
  • Fix disabled WebView Cookie Tests #24913
    Backlog
  • Unable to deploy to latest IOS device #24271
  • MAUI source generator interferes with other projects #26125
  • Thank You to Our Outstanding Contributors: @MartyIX and @albyrock87 #24650
  • Registry key does not show on registry editor but read/write works on Windows #26299
  • Regression from MAUI 8: Picker entries blank in release mode (Android) #25935
  • Unable to custom the MAUI Android Talkback configuration in the keyboard #26002
  • MAUI Grouped ListView Remove Item Causes Error when more than one Group item exists #26015
  • Incompatible ButtonHandler when embedding MAUI page in .NET Android-project #7549
  • iOS Application crashes on startup when built through Azure pipeline #18652
  • Oppo's system overrides the app's font and in place uses the system set font. #15654
  • Image loading error #21670
  • Custom Fonts Don't Show On A Real Device #19935
  • The color of hamburger icon in FlyoutPage always be changed to the white in Maui. #23087
  • Unable to set alternate app(Dynamic Icon Changes) icons in maui Android!! #22703

PullRequests

Created

  • [iOS] Fix deselect item on CollectionView #26315
    area-controls-collectionview, .NET 9 SR2
  • [main] Rebase of 26174 - Localization Updates #26309
    area-templates, area-localization, .NET 9 SR2
  • Add GraphicsView UiTestCategory #26307
    area-drawing, area-testing
  • Update Appium version to 2.12.2 #26306
    area-infrastructure, testing-infrastructure
  • [iOS] GraphicsView DrawString - fix #26304
    area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [XC] import types in StaticResourceExtension #26303
    .NET 9 SR2

Merged

  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 5 #25772
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 11 #25855
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 18 #26097
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Fix disabled WebView Cookie Tests #24978
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨
  • Migrate xml docs directly into code for ExtensionPoints #24333
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • [iOS] Shell toolbar items #20510
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Revert "Fixed CollectionView SelectedItem binding issue on initial loading" #26212
    do-not-merge, i/regression, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fix issue with template processing #26196
    area-templates, .NET 9 SR2
  • [iOS] [Mac] Fix for Gradient background size is incorrect when invalidating parent #26222
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Add options for specifying a minimum workload version requirement #25993
    .NET 9 SR2
  • [iOS] Added DidPopItem to the navigation renderer #26235
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Fix for TabbedPage - ScrollView not allowing scrolling when it should #26217
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 17 #26081
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 23 #26219
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 16 #26029
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Add support for iOS/Mac specific modals styled as popovers #23984
    community ✨, area-controls-modal
  • Support for Setting Switch Off State Color #25068
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fix TabBar visibility when navigating back from a non-tabbed page to a tabbed page #25004
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Android] Ensure all controls in Layout with Search Bar are visible in Landscape Mode #24198
    community ✨, area-controls-entry, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fix navigation stuck on iOS when pushing on hidden tab section in TabBar #22574
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Navigation from the 'more' tab #26292
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fixed HeaderFooterGrid to pass on CV1 and CV2 #26022
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
